announcement: Website hi Beta Version a la ni rih a, siam fel a nih hnuah Domain name pangngaiah sawn a ni ang.
content: Kum 40 chuang zet thingpui dawr siam a sulhnu lo nei tawh kan ni. Mizo Thingpui Dawr awlsamna leh tunlai restaurant nawmna chawhpawlh ah hian Lo leng la, tui leh puar takin lo ei ve rawh le.
